abstract: The Nippon Telegraph & Telephone Corporation agreed on Thursday to pay $3.2 billion to buy South Africa’s Dimension Data, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: The Nippon Telegraph & Telephone Corporation agreed on Thursday to pay $3.2 billion to buy South Africa’s Dimension Data, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: The Nippon Telegraph & Telephone Corporation has put some of that $10 billion burning a hole in its pocket to use in a $3.2 billion deal to buy South Africa’s Dimension Data.
